hero.heading: Fresh cuts, expertly prepared for your table
hero.description: Hand-selected halal beef, lamb, poultry, and more — cut to order and delivered fresh. Quality you can taste in every bite.

categories.heading: Our Meats
categories.description: All our products are 100% halal certified, sourced from trusted farms, and prepared fresh daily.

beef.name: Beef
beef.description: Steaks, roasts, mince, and premium cuts from grass-fed cattle.

lamb.name: Lamb
lamb.description: Chops, shanks, racks, and whole legs — tender and full of flavour.

poultry.name: Poultry
poultry.description: Whole chickens, breasts, thighs, and wings — fresh and free-range.

sausages.name: Sausages
sausages.description: House-made sausages in classic and seasonal varieties.

specialty.name: Specialty Cuts
specialty.description: Marinated meats, kebab packs, and custom cuts prepared to order.

specials.heading: Weekly Specials
specials.description: Fresh deals every week. Don't miss out on our hand-picked specials.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Ordering fresh meat has never been easier.

step1.title: Browse
step1.description: Explore our full range of halal meats, from everyday staples to specialty cuts.

step2.title: Order
step2.description: Place your order online. Choose your preferred cuts, weights, and quantities.

step3.title: Pickup or Delivery
step3.description: Collect in-store at your chosen time, or have it delivered fresh to your door.

about.heading: Quality meat, honest service
about.paragraph1: We believe great food starts with great ingredients. That is why we source only the finest halal meats, prepare them with care, and deliver them fresh to your family's table.
about.paragraph2: Whether you are cooking a weeknight dinner or hosting a special gathering, we are here to provide the cuts you need with the quality you expect.

halalCertified.title: 100% Halal Certified
halalCertified.description: Every product meets strict halal standards, certified and traceable.

responsiblySourced.title: Responsibly Sourced
responsiblySourced.description: We partner with trusted farms that prioritise animal welfare and sustainability.

expertButchers.title: Expert Butchers
expertButchers.description: Our team brings decades of experience to every cut, every order.

contact.heading: Visit Us
contact.description: Come in and see what's fresh today, or give us a call to place an order.

footer.description: Premium halal meats, expertly prepared and delivered fresh to your table.
